Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (I've been through several newspapers before the mission.)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (How could I never see this one?)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Sir, the newspaper you're reading.
Speaker.line2: Is there any good news?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I've never seen this kind of newspaper before.
Speaker.line2: May I ask which newspaper you're reading?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Not at all!
Speaker.line2: What a hectic day it has been.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: This?
Speaker.line2: The kind that's only %reserved% %for% %high-class% %elites,% like ME.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: But as it's made for %special% %elites% like me,

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: I need to keep up with these boring news.

Choices.Choice1: Ask for an example of news
Choices.Choice2: Ask if there's anything about the bomb

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: There's nothing here that would interest a middle-class like you.

Choices.Choice1: Ask for an example of news
Choices.Choice2: Ask if there's anything about the bomb

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Understood, sir.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, indeed?
Speaker.line2: Could you give me one example?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, indeed?
Speaker.line2: Is there any article about the bomb threat, sir?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Really? You're not interested at all?

Choices.Choice2: I do, but it's not my business to ask

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Yes, sir.
Speaker.line2: As you said, there is nothing interesting in there for me.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I do, sir.
Speaker.line2: But I prefer not to pry too much into a passenger's business.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Good, you're starting to become a decent servant.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: I'll share something with you as a reward.
Speaker.line2: But first, I need to know...

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Huh.
Speaker.line3: You need to answer me first.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line2: Well, that depends on you.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Where do you come from?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Eastside, sir.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Westside, sir.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: The same as you, sir

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Really? I can't tell you much then.
Speaker.line2: Or actually...
Speaker.line3: You're the one I should tell the most.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Well, it should be fine.
Speaker.line2: It's not like you are a detective in disguise anyway.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: It is the bomb news in your country.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Taking over like half of today's newspaper!

Choices.Choice1: Ask what does the news say
Choices.Choice2: Ask if it's indeed the work of the spy

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh.
Speaker.line2: What does it say?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh.
Speaker.line2: Is it really the spy's doing?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I thought it was just a rumor.
Speaker.line2: But darn it! It's actually the spy!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Of course, they even got the name.
Speaker.line2: Darn it!

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (That newspaper is quite something.)
Speaker.line2: (But he seems to have lost his cool.)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (If he's a Westsider, why does the bomb news make him so irritated?)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Are you alright, sir?
Speaker.line2: I believe this is far from your concern. No need to worry.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Is there anything concerning you, sir?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: WELL, I AM CONCERNED.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: The %kind% %of% %explosive% that damn spy use is really gigantic!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: You can't even comprehend how much damage it will cause!

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, does the news mention the kind of explosive?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: That sounds absolutely horrible...

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: No, it-

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: doesn't...

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Well, you people still have hope.
Speaker.line2: A bomb of that kind can still be defused-

Choices.Choice2: Ask how he know about the bomb

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, how do you happen to know about that, sir?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh.
Speaker.line2: I suppose you must be quite an expert about explosives, then.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I... I just happen to be an %expert% %in% %this% %field!%

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: D-darn right!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: I, Sir Archibald Pompington III,
Speaker.line2: is the most valuable %explosive% %expert% the Westside can find!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: How else would I know the name of that bomb?
Speaker.line2: Use your head a bit more, waiter!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: Good, then I can tell you some.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: It's the bomb news from Eastside.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Taking over like half of today's newspaper!

Choices.Choice1: Ask what does the news say
Choices.Choice2: Ask if it's indeed the work of the spy

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: May I ask, sir.
Speaker.line2: Could it really be the work of our spy?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: What does it say, sir?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Of course, they even got the %name.%

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Darn it!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: As the rumors from Eastside said, it is our spy.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Darn it!

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (That newspaper is quite something.)
Speaker.line2: (But he seems to have lost his cool.)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (If he's a Westsider, why does the bomb news make him so irritated?)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Are you alright, sir?
Speaker.line2: I believe this is far from your concern. No need to worry.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Is there anything concerning you, sir?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: WELL, I AM CONCERNED.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: The %kind% %of% %explosive% that damn spy use is really gigantic!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: You can't even comprehend how much damage it will cause!

Choices.Choice2: Assure him it's a good news

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, does the news mention the kind of explosive?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, but sir, it's not in our country.
Speaker.line2: It's in theirs. So, isn't this good news indeed?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Then Eastside will finally witness what we're truly capable of, sir.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: No, it-

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: doesn't...

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: But I must know!
Speaker.line2: I am an %expert% %in% %this% %field% myself!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: This is right...

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: BUT THE BOMB- THAT BOMB.

Choices.Choice1: Ask if he knows anything more

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, did you also-

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: (Let's not interrupt him.)

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Stop what you are thinking right now!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I-I just happen to be an expert in this field!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: What's with the sudden silence?
Speaker.line2: There's nothing odd about it!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I just happen to know because I'm an expert in this field.
Speaker.line2: Nothing more!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: How else would I know the name of that bomb?
Speaker.line2: Use your head, waiter!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Enough for the chat!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: I need a moment to concentrate.
Speaker.line2: At least this dessert should help me forget all about your questionnaires.
